title: Comic Zone
description: This is a 'Comic Zone' website. When a user searches for a comic, it makes an API call and shows the comic content. It uses the Marvel API to get the data.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills.

title: Todo App
description: A simple React Todo app with add, edit, delete features.

title: Weather App
description: Shows current weather and forecast using OpenWeather API.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A frontend clone of an e-commerce store with cart functionality.

title: Blog Platform
description: A blog platform where users can create, edit, and delete posts.

title: Chat App
description: Real-time chat app using Socket.IO and Node.js backend.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Track your workouts, calories and progress.

title: Movie Finder
description: Search and browse movies using TMDB API.

title: Recipe App
description: Find recipes and instructions from multiple cuisines.
